sentences.english: He yanked on the brake when he saw a big stone ahead.
sentences.chinese: 看到前面一块大石头，他猛地刹了车。

sentences.english: Like too much, love too deep, the moment can not stop the car, it became hate.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢的太过，爱的太深，一时刹不住车，就成了恨。

sentences.english: Lane Piedmont Road, a road I do not brake.
sentences.chinese: 车道山前必有路，有路我也刹不住。
